document_data.name: Myndrarra Tresstyl
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite web/Candlekeep Forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2005)/08-15 - Classic Realms Literature, Part 2}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Myndrarra Tresstyl''' was a famous dancer, [[prostitute]], and mystic in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Originally working as a tavern dancer and prostitute, Myndrarra's life changed when she wrote ''[[Swordstar]]'', a book purported to contain mystical guidance and fortune-telling secrets. This turned to widespread fame when various churches attempted to suppress her work, only resulting in it becoming a hotly desired piece of mysticism that quickly became widespread across [[Faerûn]]. She continued to work as a prostitute in her old age, as customers came to her to hear her gasp out cryptic phrases that revealed secret truths about their lives ahead.
